entry.title: Refugee Behrouz Boochani granted asylum in New Zealand

media:group.media:title: Refugee Behrouz Boochani granted asylum in New Zealand
media:group.media:description:
It means Boochani, an author known as “the voice of Manus Island” can stay here indefinitely.

entry.title: How do you know whether something is made in New Zealand and what does "made" really mean?
